title: Scripts
description: Text documents meant to be read out loud.

title: Audio Recordings
description: The actual sound files and their technical details.

title: Audio Transcriptions
description: The written-out text of what was said in a recording.

title: Audio Translation
description: Text translated from the original language into a new one.

title: Releases
description: Albums, EPs, or Singles prepared for public distribution.

title: Contributors
description: People who helped create the work, like authors or performers.

title: Audio Statuses
description: Tracks if the file is new, in progress, or finished.

title: Languages
description: The language spoken or written in the file.

title: Projects
description: Groups files together into larger collections.

title: Dialects
description: Regional accents or specific ways of speaking.

title: Audio Quality
description: How clear and clean the sound recording is.

title: Genres
description: The musical style or category (like Rock, Jazz, or Comedy).

title: Workflow Status
description: Tracks if the work is started, in progress, reviewed, or approved.

title: Moods
description: The feeling or emotion the content creates (like Happy, Sad, or Scary).

title: Themes
description: The main topic or idea discussed in the work (like Friendship or Space Travel).

title: Subject
description: Thematic topic of the phrase or text.

title: Story Type
description: The genre or format of the oral submission.

fields.label: Primary Genres (Max 2)
fields.name: starmus_assigned_genres
fields.instructions: Select up to 2 genres that best fit this recording.

fields.label: Mood (Select 1)
fields.name: starmus_assigned_mood
fields.instructions: Select the single strongest emotion for this recording.

fields.label: Theme (Select 1)
fields.name: starmus_assigned_theme
fields.instructions: Select the main topic discussed or performed.

fields.label: Workflow Status
fields.name: starmus_assigned_workflow_status
fields.instructions: Update the current production stage.

fields.label: Part of Speech
fields.name: starmus_assigned_pos
fields.instructions: Grammatical classification.

fields.label: Subject
fields.name: starmus_assigned_subject
fields.instructions: Select all topics that apply.

fields.label: Story Type
fields.name: starmus_assigned_story_type
fields.instructions: Type of story being told.

fields.label: Display Name (Legal)
fields.name: sparxstar_legal_name
fields.instructions: The real, official name of the person for contracts.

fields.label: Contact Email
fields.name: sparxstar_email
fields.instructions: The best email address to reach this person.

fields.label: Website / Portfolio
fields.name: sparxstar_website
fields.instructions: A link to their personal website or work portfolio.

fields.label: Linked WP User
fields.name: sparxstar_wp_user
fields.instructions: If this person has a login for this website, select their account here.

fields.label: IPI / CAE Number
fields.name: sparxstar_ipi_number
fields.instructions: A unique ID number used to pay music royalties.

fields.label: Directions and Instructions
fields.name: starmus_instructions
fields.instructions: Notes telling the speaker how they should sound.

fields.label: Performance Mode
fields.name: starmus_performance_mode
fields.instructions: The acting style the speaker should use.

fields.label: Energy Level
fields.name: starmus_energy_level
fields.instructions: Should the speaker sound calm or excited?

fields.label: Visual Density
fields.name: starmus_visual_density
fields.instructions: How many words appear on the screen at once.

fields.label: Source Script
fields.name: starmus_script_parent
fields.instructions: Link this script to the recording it was used for.

fields.label: File Integrity Status
fields.name: starmus_asset_health
fields.instructions: Is the file working correctly, or is it broken?

fields.label: Last Health Check
fields.name: starmus_last_fixity_check
fields.instructions: The last time the system checked if the file was safe.

fields.label: MD5/SHA Hash
fields.name: starmus_file_hash
fields.instructions: A digital fingerprint that proves the file has not been changed.

fields.label: Cloud Fingerprint (ETag)
fields.name: starmus_cloud_etag
fields.instructions: The ID used by the cloud storage to track this file.

fields.label: Original Ingest Source
fields.name: starmus_source_origin
fields.instructions: Where did this file originally come from?

fields.label: Asset Event Log (JSON)
fields.name: starmus_asset_audit_log
fields.instructions: A computer-generated list of every time this file was moved or changed.

fields.label: Copyright Status
fields.name: starmus_copyright_status
fields.instructions: Who owns the legal rights to this work?

fields.label: Usage Rules
fields.name: starmus_usage_constraints
fields.instructions: Special rules for how people are allowed to use this.

fields.label: Project Credits
fields.name: starmus_project_credits
fields.instructions: A list of people who helped make this.

sub_fields.label: Contributor
sub_fields.name: starmus_credit_contributor
sub_fields.instructions: Select the person from the database.

fields.label: Global Unique ID (UUIDv4)
fields.name: starmus_global_uuid
fields.instructions: A special computer code that identifies this file everywhere in the world.

fields.label: Creator/Author
fields.name: starmus_dc_creator
fields.instructions: The name of the main person who created this.

fields.label: Copyright Licensor
fields.name: starmus_copyright_licensor
fields.instructions: The person or company that gave permission to use this.

fields.label: Copyright Licensee
fields.name: starmus_copyright_licensee
fields.instructions: The person or company receiving permission to use this.

fields.label: Date Created/Recorded
fields.name: starmus_date_created
fields.instructions: The specific day this was recorded or written.

fields.label: License Type
fields.name: starmus_rights_type
fields.instructions: The category of legal agreement used here.

fields.label: Licensed Use
fields.name: starmus_rights_use
fields.instructions: Details on exactly how this file can be used.

fields.label: License Geography
fields.name: starmus_rights_geo
fields.instructions: Where is this license valid?

fields.label: Royalty Split
fields.name: starmus_rights_royalty
fields.instructions: Text description of the royalty agreement.

fields.label: Canonical Persistent Identifier
fields.name: starmus_stable_uri
fields.instructions: A permanent web link that will never change.

fields.label: Linked Data URI
fields.name: starmus_linked_data_uri
fields.instructions: Link to this record in another system like Wikidata.

fields.label: Data Classification
fields.name: starmus_data_classification
fields.instructions: Settings for privacy and data safety.

sub_fields.label: Consent Scope
sub_fields.name: starmus_consent_scope
sub_fields.instructions: What did the person agree to let us do with this data?

sub_fields.label: Anonymization Status
sub_fields.name: starmus_anon_status
sub_fields.instructions: Has personal information been hidden to protect privacy?

fields.label: Provenance (Audit Trail JSON)
fields.name: starmus_revision_history_json
fields.instructions: A detailed history log of changes made to this record.

fields.label: Project / Collection ID
fields.name: starmus_project_collection_id
fields.instructions: The ID of the folder or project this belongs to.

fields.label: Accession Number
fields.name: starmus_accession_number
fields.instructions: The official library number for this item.

fields.label: Session Date
fields.name: starmus_session_date
fields.instructions: The day the recording session happened.

fields.label: Session Start Time
fields.name: starmus_session_start_time
fields.instructions: When did the recording begin?

fields.label: Session End Time
fields.name: starmus_session_end_time
fields.instructions: When did the recording end?

fields.label: Location
fields.name: starmus_session_location
fields.instructions: Where the recording took place (City, Studio, etc.).

fields.label: GPS Coordinates
fields.name: starmus_session_gps
fields.instructions: The exact map location of the session.

fields.label: Subject (Contributor)
fields.name: starmus_subject_contributor
fields.instructions: The main person being interviewed or recorded.

fields.label: Interviewers / Recorders
fields.name: starmus_interviewers_recorders
fields.instructions: The people who operated the recording equipment.

fields.label: Recording Equipment
fields.name: starmus_recording_equipment
fields.instructions: List the microphones and recorders used.

fields.label: Audio Files (Originals)
fields.name: starmus_audio_files_originals
fields.instructions: Upload the raw, original audio files here.

fields.label: Media Condition Notes
fields.name: starmus_media_condition
fields.instructions: Notes about background noise or recording quality issues.

fields.label: Access Level
fields.name: starmus_access_level
fields.instructions: Who is allowed to see or hear this file?

fields.label: Audio Quality Score
fields.name: starmus_audio_quality_score
fields.instructions: Rate the technical quality of the audio.

fields.label: Recording Metadata
fields.name: starmus_recording_metadata
fields.instructions: Additional JSON metadata about the recording session.

fields.label: Is Music?
fields.name: starmus_is_music
fields.instructions: Turn this on if this is a song or musical performance.

fields.label: Parental Permission Slip
fields.name: starmus_parental_permission_slip
fields.instructions: JSON data containing the digital permission slip from the parent.

fields.label: School Reviewed
fields.name: starmus_school_reviewed
fields.instructions: JSON Object containing school review data.

fields.label: Contributor Verification
fields.name: starmus_contributor_verification
fields.instructions: JSON Object containing identity proof.

fields.label: QA Review
fields.name: starmus_qa_review
fields.instructions: JSON Object containing quality check results.

fields.label: Transcribed Metadata
fields.name: starmus_transcribed_metadata
fields.instructions: JSON object with technical details about the transcription process (timestamps, versioning).

fields.label: Transcriber Metadata
fields.name: starmus_transcriber_metadata
fields.instructions: JSON object with details about the person or AI that did the transcribing.

fields.label: Translated Metadata
fields.name: starmus_translated_metadata
fields.instructions: JSON object with technical details about the translation process.

fields.label: Translator Metadata
fields.name: starmus_translator_metadata
fields.instructions: JSON object with details about the person or AI that did the translating.

fields.label: Ai Training
fields.name: starmus_ai_training
fields.instructions: JSON Object tracking if AI used this file.

fields.label: Ai Trained
fields.name: starmus_ai_trained
fields.instructions: JSON Object listing which AI models learned from this.

fields.label: Waveform Data
fields.name: starmus_waveform_json
fields.instructions: Visual data used to draw the sound wave on the player.

fields.label: Original Source File
fields.name: starmus_original_source
fields.instructions: The very first file we received.

fields.label: Archival WAV File
fields.name: starmus_archival_wav
fields.instructions: The highest quality version of the sound (Master).

fields.label: Mastered MP3 File
fields.name: starmus_mastered_mp3
fields.instructions: A smaller, compressed file for easy listening.

fields.label: Cloud Storage Link
fields.name: starmus_cloud_object_uri
fields.instructions: The web address where the file lives in the cloud.

fields.label: Audio Processing Log
fields.name: starmus_processing_log
fields.instructions: Notes on how the audio was edited or cleaned up.

fields.label: Device Fingerprint (UEC)
fields.name: starmus_device_fingerprint
fields.instructions: A code identifying the specific computer or phone used.

fields.label: Environment Snapshot (UEC)
fields.name: starmus_environment_data
fields.instructions: JSON Object capturing details about the room or location.

fields.label: Authorized Signatory (Contributor)
fields.name: starmus_authorized_signatory
fields.instructions: The person who signed the legal agreement.

fields.label: Terms Type
fields.name: starmus_terms_type
fields.instructions: Which contract did they sign?

fields.label: Signature File
fields.name: starmus_contributor_signature
fields.instructions: An image or file of their actual signature.

fields.label: Agreement Datetime
fields.name: starmus_agreement_datetime
fields.instructions: The exact date and time they agreed.

fields.label: Submission ID
fields.name: starmus_submission_id
fields.instructions: A tracking number for this specific submission.

fields.label: Signatory IP
fields.name: starmus_contributor_ip
fields.instructions: The internet address of the person who signed.

fields.label: User Agent
fields.name: starmus_contributor_user_agent
fields.instructions: Information about the browser they used.

fields.label: Signatory Geolocation
fields.name: starmus_contributor_geolocation
fields.instructions: The map location where they were when they signed.

fields.label: Transcription Text
fields.name: starmus_transcription_text
fields.instructions: The written text of everything said in the audio.

fields.label: Time-Indexed Data (JSON)
fields.name: starmus_transcription_json
fields.instructions: Data that links specific words to specific times in the audio.

fields.label: Original Language
fields.name: starmus_original_language
fields.instructions: The language spoken in the recording.

fields.label: Translation Language
fields.name: starmus_translation_language
fields.instructions: The language this text is written in.

fields.label: Linked Audio
fields.name: starmus_linked_audio
fields.instructions: The audio recording this transcript belongs to.

fields.label: Method
fields.name: starmus_transcription_method
fields.instructions: Was this written by a person or a computer?

fields.label: Engine/Model Info
fields.name: starmus_transcription_engine
fields.instructions: If a computer did it, which software was used? (Example: Whisper).

fields.label: Text Content Hash (SHA-256)
fields.name: starmus_transcription_hash
fields.instructions: A digital fingerprint to verify the text hasn't been changed.

fields.label: Translation Text
fields.name: starmus_translation_text
fields.instructions: The text translated into the new language.

fields.label: Target Language
fields.name: starmus_target_language
fields.instructions: What language has the text been changed into?

fields.label: Linked Audio
fields.name: starmus_linked_audio
fields.instructions: The audio recording this translation belongs to.

fields.label: Translation Type
fields.name: starmus_translation_type
fields.instructions: How was the translation done? (Word-for-word or adapted for meaning).

fields.label: Back-Translation Verification
fields.name: starmus_back_translation_text
fields.instructions: The translation converted back to the original language to check accuracy.

fields.label: Source Transcription
fields.name: starmus_transcription_parent
fields.instructions: The original text this translation came from.

fields.label: Translation Hash
fields.name: starmus_translation_hash
fields.instructions: A digital fingerprint to prove the translation hasn't been changed.

label: Speaker Diarization Map
name: starmus_speaker_map
instructions: Connect the names in the text (like Speaker 1) to real people.

sub_fields.label: Label in Text
sub_fields.name: starmus_label
sub_fields.instructions: The name used in the transcript.

sub_fields.label: Actual Contributor
sub_fields.name: starmus_contributor
sub_fields.instructions: The real person who is speaking.

fields.label: Sample Rate
fields.name: starmus_sample_rate
fields.instructions: How many times per second the sound was captured.

fields.label: Bit Depth
fields.name: starmus_bit_depth
fields.instructions: The amount of detail in each sound sample.

fields.label: Tuning Frequency
fields.name: starmus_tuning_hz
fields.instructions: The pitch standard used (usually 440Hz).

fields.label: Channel Layout
fields.name: starmus_channel_layout
fields.instructions: Is the sound coming from one speaker, two speakers, or all around?

fields.label: Tempo (BPM)
fields.name: starmus_bpm
fields.instructions: The speed of the song in Beats Per Minute.

fields.label: Musical Key
fields.name: starmus_musical_key
fields.instructions: The main musical notes used in the song.

fields.label: ISRC Code
fields.name: starmus_isrc_code
fields.instructions: The official tracking code for selling this song.

fields.label: Instrumentation List
fields.name: starmus_instrumentation
fields.instructions: A list of instruments played and who played them.

sub_fields.label: Instrument
sub_fields.name: starmus_instrument
sub_fields.instructions: The name of the instrument (e.g. Guitar).

fields.label: Stem Bundle URI
fields.name: starmus_stems_cloud_uri
fields.instructions: A direct link to download the separated audio tracks.

fields.label: DAW Project Link
fields.name: starmus_daw_project_uri
fields.instructions: A link to the original project file (like Pro Tools or Ableton).

fields.label: Loudness (LUFS)
fields.name: starmus_integrated_lufs
fields.instructions: A measurement of how loud the track is on average.

fields.label: Songwriter Splits
fields.name: starmus_publishing_splits
fields.instructions: Who owns the rights to the song's lyrics and melody?

sub_fields.label: Role
sub_fields.name: starmus_role
sub_fields.instructions: What part of the song did they write?

sub_fields.label: Share %
sub_fields.name: starmus_share_percentage
sub_fields.instructions: What percentage of the money do they get?

fields.label: Master Splits
fields.name: starmus_master_splits
fields.instructions: Who owns the rights to this specific recording?

sub_fields.label: Role
sub_fields.name: starmus_role
sub_fields.instructions: What was their job on the recording?

sub_fields.label: Share %
sub_fields.name: starmus_share_percentage
sub_fields.instructions: What percentage of the money do they get?

fields.label: UPC/EAN
fields.name: starmus_upc_code
fields.instructions: The barcode number for the whole album.

fields.label: Catalog Number
fields.name: starmus_catalog_number
fields.instructions: The label's internal ID number for this release.

fields.label: Release Type
fields.name: starmus_release_type
fields.instructions: Is this a single song or a full album?

fields.label: Street Date
fields.name: starmus_release_date
fields.instructions: The date this is released to the public.

fields.label: Record Label / Imprint
fields.name: starmus_label_name
fields.instructions: The name of the company publishing this.

fields.label: Tracks
fields.name: starmus_tracklist
fields.instructions: The list of songs on this album in order.

sub_fields.label: Recording Link
sub_fields.name: starmus_recording
sub_fields.instructions: Select the recording that matches this track.

sub_fields.label: Media Side
sub_fields.name: starmus_side
sub_fields.instructions: Which side of the record or disc is this on?

sub_fields.label: ISRC Override
sub_fields.name: starmus_isrc_override
sub_fields.instructions: Use this only if the track ISRC is different from the recording ISRC.

sub_fields.label: Explicit Content
sub_fields.name: starmus_is_explicit
sub_fields.instructions: Does this song contain bad language?
